comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Princess Marie Auguste of Anhalt (10 June 1898 – 22 May 1983) was the daughter of Eduard, Duke of Anhalt and his wife Princess Louise Charlotte of Saxe-Altenburg." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Marie-Auguste_of_Anhalt On 11 March 1916 in Berlin, Marie Auguste married Prince Joachim of Prussia, the youngest son of German Emperor William II, see The Day book., February 18, 1916, LAST EDITION, Image 29 The same postcard in a better quality here:
